titleStmt.title: A relation of the defeating Card. Mazarine & Oliv. Cromwell's design to have taken Ostend by treachery in the year 1658 written in Spanish by a person of quality (who was a chief actor in the preventing of it) by way of letter to a friend of his presently after the businesse ; since printed in that language, and now translated into English.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
